description: Lucky enough to have leftover stuffing? Skip the sandwiches and transform it into a brilliant Boxing Day breakfast.

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Divide the stuffing equally between the ramekins. Then crack an egg on top of the stuffing. Add 1 tablespoonful of milk or cream to each ramekin and season with salt and pepper.
Place the ramekins in a deep baking tray and fill it partially with boiling water.
Bake for 10-15 minutes until the eggs are set.
Serve with leftover ham for brilliant Boxing Day breakfast.
title: Stuffin' muffins
